answerText: Henderson-Hasselbalch equation[10] The Henderson-Hasselbalch equation can also be used to determine the range at which these substances are useful. Examples of these substances include bromophenol blue.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 12 | 4 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Answer some questions about buffer solutions. [10] This equation gives the pH of a buffer solution from the pKa of its component acid and the concentrations of base and acid in the solution.
